name: IsLeftCancel.left_cancel
initialProofState:
α : Sort u
op : α → α → α
self : IsLeftCancel α op
a b c : α
a✝ : Eq (op a b) (op a c)
⊢ Eq b c
decl:
@[deprecated "No deprecation message was provided." (since := "2024-09-11")]
class IsLeftCancel (α : Sort u) (op : α → α → α) : Prop where
  left_cancel : ∀ a b c, op a b = op a c → b = c

name: IsRightCancel.right_cancel
initialProofState:
α : Sort u
op : α → α → α
self : IsRightCancel α op
a b c : α
a✝ : Eq (op a b) (op c b)
⊢ Eq a c
decl:
@[deprecated "No deprecation message was provided." (since := "2024-09-11")]
class IsRightCancel (α : Sort u) (op : α → α → α) : Prop where
  right_cancel : ∀ a b c, op a b = op c b → a = c
